verbs.description: When [ARG0: Stephenee Simms] [V: heard] [ARGM-TMP: in 2006] [ARG1: that Donald Trump was building condo towers in Baja] , the lure of a posh weekend getaway on the rustic coast just south of Tijuana was hard to resist .
When Stephenee Simms heard in 2006 that Donald Trump [V: was] building condo towers in Baja , the lure of a posh weekend getaway on the rustic coast just south of Tijuana was hard to resist .

When Stephenee Simms heard in 2006 that [ARG0: Donald Trump] was [V: building] [ARG1: condo towers] [ARGM-LOC: in Baja] , the lure of a posh weekend getaway on the rustic coast just south of Tijuana was hard to resist .

[ARGM-TMP: When Stephenee Simms heard in 2006 that Donald Trump was building condo towers in Baja] , [ARG1: the lure of a posh weekend getaway on the rustic coast just south of Tijuana] [V: was] [ARG2: hard to resist] .
